name: Svarogue (7DRL)
description:
A 7DRL to show off my level generation algorithm, and to try out combat with a separate weapon entity. You can still bump to attack, but the separate weapon is much more effective. It's a proof of concept for an alternate combat system.

Written in rust, using RLTK / bracket-lib. Owes a lot to this tutorial: https://bfnightly.bracketproductions.com/rustbook/

Font is from this pack: https://mattwalkden.itch.io/pixel-font-pack

arrows or hjklyubn - movement

i - inventory

. - down stairs

, or g - pick up

a - (followed by a movement key) move your weapon separately

z - (followed by a movement key) to dodge
